channel.title: Please help me! I get errors on EVERY script I run!
channel.description:
Hello, I have SCAR 3.15b Divi with SRL 428. It is all downloaded and installed.
When I try and run a script i always get errors like:
Failed when compiling Line 257: [Error] (16631:8): Unknown identifier 'FindMime' in script C:\Documents and Settings\XXXX\Desktop\MYUberMultiFighter_V3.6.scar
Seems to happen alot to the randoms :S
The script SRL.scar is included and other people say the script works. Please help!

item.title: Please help me! I get errors on EVERY script I run!
item.dc:creator: @SRL_benjaa SRL benjaa
item.description:
@SRL_benjaa wrote:

Antirandoms.scar is missing perhaps

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me! I get errors on EVERY script I run!

item.title: Please help me! I get errors on EVERY script I run!
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

Redownload the script and also update your SRL by going to ‘File’ —> ‘Update SRL SVN’. Then try the script again. Also make sure that if you have the script on your desktop there is no older version of SRL on there because it will use that and no the SRL that is in your Includes Folder. Unless that bug was fixed. idk

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me! I get errors on EVERY script I run!
